entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
